scripts.build: node scripts/check-cache-size.mjs && pnpm build:packages && pnpm -F @command-center/dashboard build
scripts.build:packages: pnpm -C packages/api build && pnpm -C packages/client build
scripts.test:rc: BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3232 CC_REUSE_SERVERS=1 pnpm -C apps/dashboard exec playwright test tests/all-pages.spec.ts --reporter=list
scripts.test:integration: pnpm -C packages/client exec vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.ts
